channel.title: Emote id for thieving stalls!

item.title: Emote id for thieving stalls!
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

I think that might be a delta thing, but I wouldn’t know since I’ve never used it. Try changing this.
public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
actionInterval = 4000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(3367);
sM(“You take from the stall…”);
sM(message);
addItem(995, 100000);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 10000);
}
To an actual level.

Read full topic

item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

dillingo:

Did you copy and paste that right into your server?[/quote] no i didnt… it was already there…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 20, 2009, 07:25:07 pm[/size][hr][quote=“dillingo, post:2, topic:289933”]Did you copy and paste that right into your server?

These are the stalls ive just added…

}
}
if(objectID == 2561){
TheifStall(“cake stall”, “and recieve a baked cake”, 1, 75playerLevel[17], 1891, 1, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2562){
TheifStall(“gem stall”, “and recieve 10m”, 80, 7500playerLevel[17], 995, 10000000, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2560){
TheifStall(“silk stall”, “and recieve 1m”, 1, 500playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 2565){
TheifStall(“silver stall”, “and recieve 5m”, 50, 1500playerLevel[17], 995, 5000000, 0x340);
}
if(objectID == 4708){
TheifStall(“vegetable stall”, “and recieve a tomatoe”, 6000, 35*playerLevel[17], 1982, 1, 0x340);
}
thats the code for them… and all except the veggie stall thats an addon lol…and this is the other code…

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
actionInterval = 4000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(3367);
sM(“You take from the stall…”);
sM(message);
addItem(995, 100000);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 10000);
}

item.title: Emote id for thieving stalls!
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

Can someone give me the emote id for thieving stalls like if u theived from the stalls u wouldnt d/c thats the problem im having i added thieving stalls in my server and it kicks u when u go to thiev from it and i think its bc it doesnt have the right animation id for thieving.

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) {
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
actionInterval = 4000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(3367);
sM(“You take from the stall…”);
sM(message);
addItem(995, 100000);
addSkillXP(XPamount, 10000);
}

3367 is incorrect.
